sentence:
• Shares of Twitter Inc ( TWTR ) soared 21.4% after the company entered into discussionswith potential buyers including Alphabet Inc. ( GOOGL ) and Salesforce.com ( CRM )
• Shares of Yahoo!

Inc. ( YHOO ) dropped 3.1% after the company disclosed that information on at least 500 million user accounts has been stolen
• Shares of Facebook Inc ( FB ) fell 1.6% after a report showed that big buyers are upset that the social media company overestimated viewing time for video ads on its platform
• Endo International plc's ( ENDP ) shares surged 15.5% after the company appointed Paul V. Campanelli as its president and chief executive officer
